rèn /ren4/
1. to recognize; to know; to admit
2. to assign; to appoint; to take up a post; office; responsibility; to let; to allow; to give free rein to; no matter (how, what etc); classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in )
3. edge of blade
4. annealed; pliable but strong; tough; tenacious
5. unit of length used in ancient times, equal to 7 or 8 Chinese feet »chǐ«
6. pregnant; pregnancy
7. fill up; to stuff
8. to thread (a needle); (bound form) to sew; to stitch; (literary) very grateful
9. to weave; to lay warp for weaving; silk thread for weaving; to stitch; thread
10. to weave; to lay warp for weaving
11. (literary) overlapping part of Chinese gown; lapel; sleeping mat
12. (literary) slow in speech
13. brake
14. cooked food; to cook (until ready)
15. hoopoe
rèn /ren4/
rènzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to recognize; to know; to admit
2. to assign; to appoint; to take up a post; office; responsibility; to let; to allow; to give free rein to; no matter (how, what etc); classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in )
3. edge of blade
4. annealed; pliable but strong; tough; tenacious
5. unit of length used in ancient times, equal to 7 or 8 Chinese feet »chǐ«

7. fill up; to stuff
8. to thread (a needle); (bound form) to sew; to stitch; (literary) very grateful

14. cooked food; to cook (until ready)

rèn /ren4/

Rì Zhōng /Ri4 Zhong1/*
■ Japan-China
róng /rong2/
1. to hold; to contain; to allow; to tolerate; appearance; look; countenance
2. glory; honor; thriving
3. to melt; to thaw; to blend; to merge; to be in harmony
4. velvet; woolen
5. to dissolve; soluble
6. to smelt; to fuse
7. paste made by mashing beans or seeds etc; used in »fúróng«, lotus
8. (bound form) (of newly sprouted grass) soft and fine; downy
9. generic term for weapons (old); army (matters); military affairs
10. marmoset (zoology)
11. (used in female names)
12. Chinese banyan (Ficus microcarpa)
13. down; felt
14. wool of sheep
15. salamander
róng /rong2/
róngzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to hold; to contain; to allow; to tolerate; appearance; look; countenance
2. glory; honor; thriving
3. to melt; to thaw; to blend; to merge; to be in harmony
4. velvet; woolen
5. to dissolve; soluble
6. to smelt; to fuse
7. paste made by mashing beans or seeds etc; used in »fúróng«, lotus
8. (bound form) (of newly sprouted grass) soft and fine; downy
9. generic term for weapons (old); army (matters); military affairs
10. marmoset (zoology)
11. (used in female names)
12. Chinese banyan (Ficus microcarpa)
13. down; felt
14. wool of sheep
15. salamander
róng /rong2/
róngguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to hold; to contain; to allow; to tolerate; appearance; look; countenance
2. glory; honor; thriving
3. to melt; to thaw; to blend; to merge; to be in harmony
4. velvet; woolen
5. to dissolve; soluble
6. to smelt; to fuse
7. paste made by mashing beans or seeds etc; used in »fúróng«, lotus
8. (bound form) (of newly sprouted grass) soft and fine; downy
9. generic term for weapons (old); army (matters); military affairs
10. marmoset (zoology)
11. (used in female names)
12. Chinese banyan (Ficus microcarpa)
13. down; felt
14. wool of sheep
15. salamander
róng /rong2/
róngle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to hold; to contain; to allow; to tolerate; appearance; look; countenance
2. glory; honor; thriving
3. to melt; to thaw; to blend; to merge; to be in harmony
4. velvet; woolen
5. to dissolve; soluble
6. to smelt; to fuse
7. paste made by mashing beans or seeds etc; used in »fúróng«, lotus
8. (bound form) (of newly sprouted grass) soft and fine; downy
9. generic term for weapons (old); army (matters); military affairs
10. marmoset (zoology)
11. (used in female names)
12. Chinese banyan (Ficus microcarpa)
13. down; felt
14. wool of sheep
15. salamander
Róng /Rong2/
1. short name for Chengdu »Chéngdū«
2. Rong, another name for Fuzhou »Fúzhōu«
róngbīng /rong2 bing1/*
■ (lit. or fig.) thawing
róngbudé /rong2 bu5 de2/*
■ unable to tolerate; intolerant; unable to bear sth
róngbù /rong2 bu4/*
■ flannel

■ Rongchang, a district of Chongqing »Chóngqìng«
Róngchāng Qū /Rong2chang1 Qu1/
■ Rongchang, a district of Chongqing »Chóngqìng«
róngchē /rong2 che1/*
■ military vehicle
Róngchéng /Rong2 cheng2/*
1. Rongcheng county in Baoding »Bǎodìng«, Hebei
2. Rongcheng, county-level city in Weihai , Shandong
3. nickname for Chengdu »Chéngdū«

■ (geology) solutional cave (typically, a limestone cave)
róngduàn /rong2duan4/
■ (of fuse wire) to melt; to blow; (fig.) to halt stock trading; (fig.) to suspend an airline from operating flights on a given route (as a penalty, e.g. for bringing in more than a specified number of passengers who test positive for COVID)
róngduàn /rong2duan4/
róngduànzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
■ (of fuse wire) to melt; to blow; (fig.) to halt stock trading; (fig.) to suspend an airline from operating flights on a given route (as a penalty, e.g. for bringing in more than a specified number of passengers who test positive for COVID)
róngduàn /rong2duan4/
róngduànguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
■ (of fuse wire) to melt; to blow; (fig.) to halt stock trading; (fig.) to suspend an airline from operating flights on a given route (as a penalty, e.g. for bringing in more than a specified number of passengers who test positive for COVID)
róngduàn /rong2duan4/
róngduànle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

10. adorned; beautiful

rùn /run4/
1. moist; glossy; sleek
2. to moisten; to lubricate
3. to embellish; to enhance
4. profit; remuneration
5. (neologism c. 2021) (slang) (loanword from "run") to emigrate (in order to flee adverse conditions)
6. intercalary; an extra day or month inserted into the lunar or solar calendar (such as February 29)
rùn /run4/
rùnzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. moist; glossy; sleek
2. to moisten; to lubricate
3. to embellish; to enhance
4. profit; remuneration
5. (neologism c. 2021) (slang) (loanword from "run") to emigrate (in order to flee adverse conditions)
6. intercalary; an extra day or month inserted into the lunar or solar calendar (such as February 29)
rùn /run4/

4. profit; remuneration
5. (neologism c. 2021) (slang) (loanword from "run") to emigrate (in order to flee adverse conditions)
6. intercalary; an extra day or month inserted into the lunar or solar calendar (such as February 29)
rùn /run4/

Sānguó /San1guo2/
■ Three Kingdoms period (220-280) in Chinese history; any of several Three Kingdoms periods in Korean history, esp. from 1st century AD to unification under Silla »Xīnluó« in 658
Sānguóshǐjì /San1 guo2 shi3 ji4/*
■ History of Three Kingdoms (Korean: Samguk Sagi), the oldest extant Korean history, compiled under Kim Busik »Jīn Fùshì« in 1145. The three kingdoms are Goguryeo »Gāogōulí«, Baekje »Bǎijì«, Silla »Xīnluó«.
Sānguózhì /San1 guo2 zhi4/*
■ History of the Three Kingdoms, fourth of the 24 dynastic histories »Èrshísì Shǐ«, composed by Chen Shou »Chén Shòu« in 289 during Jin Dynasty »Jìncháo«, 65 scrolls
Sānguó Yǎnyì /San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4/*
■ Romance of the Three Kingdoms by Luo Guanzhong »Luó Guànzhōng«, one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature, a fictional account of the Three Kingdoms at the break-up of the Han around 200 AD, portraying Liu Bei's »Liú Bèi« Shu Han »Shǔ Hàn« as heroes and Cao Cao's »Cáo Cāo« Wei »Wèi« as villains

■ the Three Parallel Rivers of Yunnan Protected Areas, a region in northwestern Yunnan where three major rivers - the Jinsha River (upper Yangtze) »Jīnshā Jiāng«, Lancang River (Mekong) »Láncāng Jiāng«, and Nu River (Salween) »Nù Jiāng« - run roughly parallel to each other for over 300 kilometers, recognized as a World Heritage Site

11. blowing of the wind

sǎng /sang3/
sǎngguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to push forcefully; to shove
2. throat; voice
3. stone plinth
4. (literary) forehead
sǎng /sang3/
sǎngle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to push forcefully; to shove
2. throat; voice
3. stone plinth
4. (literary) forehead

1. thirty
2. preceding

16. (literary) to cripple; to harm; to injure
17. shark family, including some rays and skates
shā /sha1/
shāguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to kill; to slay; to murder; to attack
2. to weaken; to reduce
3. (dialect) to smart
4. (used after a verb) extremely
5. granule; hoarse; raspy; sand; powder; CL: lì
6. abbr. for Tsar or Tsarist Russia
7. katydid (family Tettigoniidae); phonetic "sha" used in transliteration
8. shark
9. cotton yarn; muslin
10. to terminate; to cut short; to bring to a stop; to squeeze; to tighten; to damage
11. to brake
12. sand; gravel; granule
13. cholera
14. Zanthoxylum ailanthoides
15. (old) spear; lance
16. (literary) to cripple; to harm; to injure
17. shark family, including some rays and skates
shā /sha1/
shāle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to kill; to slay; to murder; to attack
2. to weaken; to reduce
3. (dialect) to smart
4. (used after a verb) extremely
5. granule; hoarse; raspy; sand; powder; CL: lì

11. to brake

13. cholera

shānzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. mountain; hill; CL: zuò
2. (coll.) small bundle of straw for silkworms to spin cocoons on
3. to fan; to slap sb on the face
4. to delete
5. garment; jacket with open slits in place of sleeves
6. to fan into a flame; to incite
7. China fir; Cunninghamia lanceolata; also pr. »shā«
8. coral
9. tearfully
10. straw mat; thatch
11. to mix water with clay
12. (archaic) vicious dog; beast resembling a wolf
13. panicum frumentaceum
14. fringe; ornament of banner
15. (old) a flock of sheep or goats
16. fetid; gamy; rank
17. (esp.) hircine
18. sampan
19. to cut down; to mow; to eliminate; scythe
20. samarium (chemistry)

shāo /shao1/
1. to burn; to cook; to stew; to bake; to roast; to heat; to boil (tea, water etc); fever; to run a temperature; (coll.) to let things go to one's head
2. somewhat; a little

6. basket; bucket
7. stern of boat
8. ends of a bow
9. serrated edges on a Chinese flag
10. jungle grass; lair
11. long-legged spider
12. tail of a comet; long hair

Shǎnxīdàdìzhèn /Shan3 xi1 da4 di4 zhen4/*
■ the great Shaanxi earthquake of 2nd February 1556 that killed 830,000 people
Shǎnxī Kējì Dàxué /Shan3 xi1 Ke1 ji4 Da4 xue2/*
■ Shaanxi University of Science and Technology

■ Shaanxi Province, capital Xi'an »Xī'ān Shì« (abbr. to »Shǎn« or »Qín«)

shàn /shan4/
1. fan; sliding, hinged or detachable flat part of sth; classifier for doors, windows etc
2. good (virtuous); benevolent; well-disposed; good at sth; to improve or perfect
3. without authority; to usurp; to arrogate to oneself; to monopolize; expert in; to be good at
4. to abdicate
5. hernia
6. meals
7. to repair; to mend; to rewrite; to transcribe
8. Chinese yellow eel
9. bamboo fish trap; used in names of places connected with Shantou »Shàntóu«
10. to geld
11. river in Zhejiang
12. level spot for sacrifices
13. (literary) to go through successive changes; to evolve
14. easy; quiet
15. to cut down; mow
16. earthworm
17. to mock; to ridicule; to slander
18. to beguile; to cajole
19. to support; to provide for
20. to jump; to leave
21. name of a district in Xinjiang
22. to cut with a sickle; large sickle

3. eloquent; good at arguing

shàngxià /shang4xia4/
1. the top and bottom of sth
2. the full vertical extent of sth; from top to bottom
3. to go up and down
4. before and after (as in »shàngxiàwén« "context")
5. (used after a quantity) approximately; ... or so
6. (in a social hierarchy) the high and the low; seniors and juniors (as in »shàngxià-hémù« "harmony between superiors and subordinates")
7. all members of a group (as in »jǔguó-shàngxià« "the entire nation")
8. relative superiority (as in »bùxiāng-shàngxià« "evenly matched")
shàngxià /shang4xia4/
shàngxiàzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. the top and bottom of sth
2. the full vertical extent of sth; from top to bottom
3. to go up and down
4. before and after (as in »shàngxiàwén« "context")
5. (used after a quantity) approximately; ... or so
6. (in a social hierarchy) the high and the low; seniors and juniors (as in »shàngxià-hémù« "harmony between superiors and subordinates")
7. all members of a group (as in »jǔguó-shàngxià« "the entire nation")
8. relative superiority (as in »bùxiāng-shàngxià« "evenly matched")
shàngxià /shang4xia4/
shàngxiàguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. the top and bottom of sth
2. the full vertical extent of sth; from top to bottom
3. to go up and down
4. before and after (as in »shàngxiàwén« "context")
5. (used after a quantity) approximately; ... or so
6. (in a social hierarchy) the high and the low; seniors and juniors (as in »shàngxià-hémù« "harmony between superiors and subordinates")
7. all members of a group (as in »jǔguó-shàngxià« "the entire nation")
8. relative superiority (as in »bùxiāng-shàngxià« "evenly matched")
shàngxià /shang4xia4/
shàngxiàle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. the top and bottom of sth
2. the full vertical extent of sth; from top to bottom
3. to go up and down
4. before and after (as in »shàngxiàwén« "context")
5. (used after a quantity) approximately; ... or so
6. (in a social hierarchy) the high and the low; seniors and juniors (as in »shàngxià-hémù« "harmony between superiors and subordinates")
7. all members of a group (as in »jǔguó-shàngxià« "the entire nation")
8. relative superiority (as in »bùxiāng-shàngxià« "evenly matched")

shēn /shen1/
1. body; life; oneself; personally; one's morality and conduct; the main part of a structure or body; pregnant; classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset; Kangxi radical 158
2. deep (lit. and fig.)
3. to stretch; to extend
4. ginseng; one of the 28 constellations
5. to extend; to state; to explain; 9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey; ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
6. arsenic (chemistry)
7. member of gentry
8. (literary) to recite; to chant; to intone
9. (bound form) groan
10. long; numerous
11. carangid (zoology)
12. large crowd
13. to advance
14. (used in female names)
15. pregnant
16. (literary) two mountains standing next to each other
17. (constellation)
18. xenon (chemistry) (old)
19. brisk; vigorous (of fire)
20. a kind of jade
21. multitude; crowd
22. crushed grain
23. ginseng
24. to inform; to inquire

shēng /sheng1/
1. to be born; to give birth; life; to grow; raw; uncooked; student
2. sound; voice; tone; noise; reputation; classifier for sounds
3. to ascend; to rise
4. to promote; to elevate
5. liter
6. unit of dry measure for grain (= one liter or one-tenth dou »dǒu«)
7. domestic animal; sacrificial animal
8. sheng, a free reed wind instrument with vertical bamboo pipes
9. (bound form) sister's son; nephew
10. gallon; quart
11. rising of water
12. stoat; weasel
shēng /sheng1/
shēngzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

12. stoat; weasel
shēng /sheng1/
shēngguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to be born; to give birth; life; to grow; raw; uncooked; student
2. sound; voice; tone; noise; reputation; classifier for sounds
3. to ascend; to rise
4. to promote; to elevate
5. liter
6. unit of dry measure for grain (= one liter or one-tenth dou »dǒu«)
7. domestic animal; sacrificial animal
8. sheng, a free reed wind instrument with vertical bamboo pipes
9. (bound form) sister's son; nephew
10. gallon; quart
11. rising of water
12. stoat; weasel
shēng /sheng1/
shēngle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to be born; to give birth; life; to grow; raw; uncooked; student
2. sound; voice; tone; noise; reputation; classifier for sounds
3. to ascend; to rise
4. to promote; to elevate

7. domestic animal; sacrificial animal
8. sheng, a free reed wind instrument with vertical bamboo pipes

10. gallon; quart
11. rising of water
12. stoat; weasel

shén /shen2/

7. what

shè /she4/
1. to shoot; to launch; to allude to; radio- (chemistry)
2. to set up; to put in place
3. (math.) given; suppose; if
4. (bound form) society; organization; agency
5. (old) god of the land
6. to ascend in light steps
7. (bound form) residence; house; (bound form) my (in speaking of relatives younger than oneself, as in »shèmèi«); (archaic) unit of distance equal to 30 li »lǐ«
8. (bound form) to take in; to absorb; to assimilate
9. to capture (video or still images)
10. (literary) to conserve (one's health)
11. (literary) to act for
12. (literary) to wade across a body of water; (bound form) to experience; to undergo; to be involved; to concern
13. to pardon (a convict)
14. (bound form) to fear; to be cowed
15. (bound form) to frighten; to intimidate
16. Taiwan pr. »zhé«
17. musk deer (Moschus moschiferus); also called
18. name of a district in Anhui
19. name of a river
20. Thea sinensis
21. Podisma mikado
22. archer's thumb ring
23. mare; female horse

shèzúguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
■ to set foot in; to step into; to become involved for the first time
shèzú /she4 zu2/*
shèzúle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
■ to set foot in; to step into; to become involved for the first time
shè'àn /she4 an4/*
■ (of a perpetrator, victim, weapon, sum of money etc) to be involved in the case
Shè Xiàn /She4 Xian4/
■ She County in Huangshan »Huángshān«, Anhui
shī /shi1/
1. teacher; master; expert; model; army division; (old) troops; to dispatch troops
2. (literary) person representing the deceased (during burial ceremonies); (literary) to put a corpse on display (after execution)
3. (bound form) corpse
4. moist; wet
5. to lose; to miss; to fail
6. poem; CL: shǒu
7. poetry; verse
8. (bound form) to put into effect (regulations etc); to distribute (alms etc); to apply (fertilizer etc)
9. (bound form) lion
10. louse
11. yarrow (Achillea millefolium)
12. rough, indelicate silk
13. Xanthium strumarium
14. place name
15. (literary) to filter (wine); to pour (wine or tea); to dredge; also pr. »shāi«; Taiwan pr. »sī«
16. yellowtail (Seriola qinqueradiata)
17. turtledove
18. nuthatch (bird of genus Sitta)

Shī Láng /Shi1 Lang2/
■ Shi Lang (1621-1696), Chinese admiral who served under the Ming and Qing dynasties
Shī Míngdé /Shi1 Ming2de2/
■ Shih Ming-teh (1941-2024), Taiwanese politician, imprisoned 1962-1977 and 1980-1990 under the Guomindang, subsequently a leader of DPP »Mínjìndǎng«, in 2006 led protests against Chen Shui-Bian »Chén Shuǐbiǎn«
Shī Nài'ān /Shi1 Nai4 an1/*

Shī Shū /Shi1 Shu1/*
■ the Book of Songs »Shījīng« and the Book of History »Shūjīng«
shí /shi2/
1. o'clock; time; when; hour; season; period
2. ten; 10
3. to eat; food; animal feed; eclipse
4. rock; stone; stone inscription; one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments »bāyīn«
5. ten (used in fractions, writing checks etc); assorted; miscellaneous
6. real; true; honest; really; solid; fruit; seed; definitely
7. to pick up; to collate or arrange; ten (banker's anti-fraud numeral)
8. to know; knowledge; Taiwan pr. »shì«
9. to nibble away at sth; to eat into; to erode
10. (Japanese kokuji) street corner; intersection; used in Japanese personal and place names; pr. tsuji
11. numeral 10 in the Suzhou numeral system »Sūzhōumǎzi«
12. rock; phonetic "dol" used in names (Korean kugja)
13. hen roost
14. really; solid
15. clear water; pure
16. stoneware
17. stone shrine
18. long-tailed marmot
19. a kind of rat
shí /shi2/
shízhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

shí /shi2/
shíle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. o'clock; time; when; hour; season; period
2. ten; 10
3. to eat; food; animal feed; eclipse
4. rock; stone; stone inscription; one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments »bāyīn«
5. ten (used in fractions, writing checks etc); assorted; miscellaneous
6. real; true; honest; really; solid; fruit; seed; definitely
7. to pick up; to collate or arrange; ten (banker's anti-fraud numeral)
8. to know; knowledge; Taiwan pr. »shì«
9. to nibble away at sth; to eat into; to erode
10. (Japanese kokuji) street corner; intersection; used in Japanese personal and place names; pr. tsuji
11. numeral 10 in the Suzhou numeral system »Sūzhōumǎzi«
12. rock; phonetic "dol" used in names (Korean kugja)
13. hen roost
14. really; solid
15. clear water; pure
16. stoneware
17. stone shrine
18. long-tailed marmot
19. a kind of rat

1. to make; to cause; to enable; to use; to employ; to send; to instruct sb to do sth; envoy; messenger

3. (bound form) secretion (of the ear, eye etc)
4. history; annals; title of an official historian in ancient China
5. (of a vehicle, horse etc) to go fast; to speed
6. (of a vehicle) to run; to go
7. (of a boat) to sail
8. to begin; to start; then; only then
9. arrow; dart; straight; to vow; to swear
10. hog; swine

■ to lose one's temper
shì /shi4/
1. to be (followed by substantives only)
2. correct; right; true
3. (respectful acknowledgement of a command) very well
4. (adverb for emphatic assertion)
5. matter; thing; item; work; affair; CL: jiàn, zhuāng, huí
6. to test; to try; experiment; examination; test
7. room; work unit; grave; scabbard; family or clan; one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy
8. type; form; pattern; style
9. market; city; municipality (administrative unit); (literary) to trade; to buy and sell goods
10. (literary, or bound form) to look at
11. life; age; generation; era; world; lifetime; epoch; descendant; noble
12. member of the senior ministerial class (old); scholar (old); bachelor; honorific; soldier; noncommissioned officer; specialist worker
13. oath; vow; to swear; to pledge
14. power; influence; potential; momentum; tendency; trend; situation; conditions; outward appearance; sign; gesture; male genitals
15. (bound form) family name; surname (as in »Wángshì« "the Wang clan")
16. (bound form) maiden name; née (as in »Lǐ Wángshì« "Mrs. Li, née Wang")
17. (bound form) honorific suffix added to the surname or full name of a notable person, esp. historical or scholarly figures
18. to show; to reveal
19. addicted to; fond of; stem corresponding to -phil or -phile
20. (of flowing water or time) to pass by; to pass away; to die
21. decoration; ornament; to decorate; to adorn; to hide; to conceal (a fault); excuse (to hide a fault); to play a role (in opera); to impersonate
22. to explain; to release; Buddha (abbr. for »Shìjiāmóuní«); Buddhism
23. to fit; suitable; proper; just (now); comfortable; well; to go; to follow or pursue
24. to serve; to attend upon
25. to devour; to bite
26. to wipe
27. to serve as an official; an official; the two chess pieces in Chinese chess guarding the "general" or "king" »jiàng«
28. to lick; to lap (up)
29. (literary) to grow; (literary) to transplant; Taiwan pr. »shí«
30. to murder a superior; to murder one's parent
31. (literary) (of a bee or spider etc) to sting or bite
32. persimmon
33. (literary) handrail at the front of a carriage or chariot; to bow while leaning on this handrail as a gesture of respect
34. (bound form) posthumous name or title; (literary) to confer a posthumous name or title
35. cerium (chemistry)
36. (literary) majestic; magnificent
37. (literary) rich, deep red
38. (literary) angry; furious
39. accustomed to; habit
40. (bound form) to rely on; (literary) one's mother
41. door pivot
42. to hold; to grasp
43. (tree)
44. bank; shore; name of a river
45. divine by stalk
46. to examine; to judge
47. to borrow; to buy on credit; to rent out

shǒusuìguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
